Jinnō Shōtōki, pp. 192-195. ==Events of the Chōhō era== * 999 (Chōhō 1, 11th month: A daughter of Fujiwara no Michinaga becomes a consort of Emperor Ichijō.Titsingh, p. 153. * 1001 (Chōhō 3, 11th month): The Imperial palace was destroyed by fire. * 1001 (Chōhō 3, 12th month): The widow of Emperor En'yū and the mother of Emperor Ichijō died. ==Related pages == * Heian period ==References== ==Other websites== * National Diet Library, "The Japanese Calendar" -- historical overview plus illustrative images from library's collection Chōhō 1st 2nd 3rd 4th 5th 6th 999 1000 1001 1002 1003 1004 Preceded by: Shōryaku Era or nengō: Chōhō Succeeded by: Kankō Category:Japanese eras
